abstract: Cisco Systems has finally put its weight squarely behind WiMax wireless broadband technology, announcing on Tuesday a $330 million agreement to buy the privately held Navini Networks.
lead_paragraph: Cisco Systems has finally put its weight squarely behind WiMax wireless broadband technology, announcing on Tuesday a $330 million agreement to buy the privately held Navini Networks.

headline.main: Cisco Goes WiMax With Navini Deal
